cards.loreDescription: The enigmatic Undine serves as custodian of water's ancient wisdom, her translucent form rippling with currents of deep sapphire and aquamarine. As Water Oracle, she perceives time not as linear progression but as flowing streams of possibility, allowing her to glimpse fragments of potential futures and draw insights from the depths of the past. Her crystalline eyes reflect not what is before them but what might be, guiding her followers with cryptic visions and strategic foresight rather than direct intervention.

cards.name: Ignus | The Fire Titan

ability.name: Inferno Fury
ability.description: While attacking, this creature gains 50 Strength and Pierce.

specialAbility.name: Infernal Rage
specialAbility.description: Discard 1 card from your opponent's hand.

cards.cardFact: When Ignus confronts an opponent, the ambient temperature rises so dramatically that nearby creatures instinctively give up their essence reserves, attempting to cool themselves in the face of its overwhelming heat.
cards.loreDescription: An ancient fire entity whose form resembles a towering warrior composed of controlled flame and molten rock. Ignus's core burns with a white-hot intensity that never diminishes, while the outer layers of its body range from deep crimson to brilliant gold. Centuries of existence have taught Ignus to harness fire's destructive potential with precise control, focusing its overwhelming strength exactly where needed. When it speaks, its voice carries the crackling intensity of a wildfire yet remains measured and deliberate.

cards.name: Sigmus | The Fire Tempest

ability.name: Heatwave
ability.description: When this card is summoned, deal 50 damage to all creatures and shields your opponent controls.

specialAbility.name: Solar Flare
specialAbility.description: Deal 25 damage to all creatures and shields on the field.

cards.cardFact: Sigmus developed the Solar Flare technique after studying ancient volcanic glass formations, allowing for perfectly balanced damage distribution across both enemy and friendly forces when tactical situations demand such sacrifice.
cards.loreDescription: A fire master whose mastery lies not in raw power but in the precise distribution of heat and flame. Sigmus appears as a humanoid figure whose body is composed of controlled fire with patterns that resemble flowing robes or armor depending on their current purpose. Unlike more chaotic fire entities, Sigmus specializes in calculated, widespread effect, generating precisely calibrated waves of heat that can target multiple opponents simultaneously without causing collateral damage to allies.

cards.name: Viktor | The Fire Chimera

ability.name: Flame Ascendance
ability.description: You may destroy any creature you control to gain 65 Strength and 35 Agility and gain Pierce until the end of the turn.

specialAbility.name: Fiery Rebirth
specialAbility.description: Immediately after using Flame Ascendance, return the destroyed creature to the field.

cards.cardFact: Viktor's unique physiology allows him to temporarily absorb the essence of destroyed creatures, incorporating their strongest traits into his own form before they dissipate back into elemental energy.
cards.loreDescription: A fearsome amalgamation of predatory beasts fused through ancient fire magic, Viktor's body radiates intense heat that warps the air around him. His primary salamander form is augmented with draconic features: serpentine neck, scaled wings, and a lashing scorpion-like tail tipped with venomous flame. When Viktor channels his power, the rune markings across his obsidian hide glow like magma flowing through cracks in cooling stone. Despite his monstrous appearance, Viktor possesses a calculating intelligence, carefully selecting which creatures to sacrifice to fuel his devastating flame ascendance.

cards.name: Terra | The Earth Titan

ability.name: Ground Quake
ability.description: Exhaust or Refresh 1 creature on the field (excluding itself).

specialAbility.name: Seismic Tremor
specialAbility.description: Deplete 2 essence from your opponent's essence pool.

cards.cardFact: Terra does not sleep but instead periodically merges completely with the ground, becoming indistinguishable from natural stone formations while their consciousness communes with the earth's deepest layers.
cards.loreDescription: A colossal entity born from the oldest mountains of Kinbrold, Terra stands as a living embodiment of earth's strength. Their massive body appears as a humanoid formation of interlocking stone plates that shift with surprising grace despite their immense weight. Terra's voice resonates with the deep rumble of tectonic movement, and each deliberate step connects with the ground in ways that can either stabilize or destabilize the surrounding terrain depending on their intent.

cards.name: Oryssa | The Earth Tempest

ability.name: Fortified Bastion
ability.description: While this card is on the field, your shields gain 50 Health. When this card is destroyed, you may restore 1 Shield to its original Tier.

specialAbility.name: Geo Surge
specialAbility.description: Choose 1 creature on the field to gain 50 Strength until the end of the turn.

cards.cardFact: Oryssa developed her distinctive defensive techniques after studying the crystalline patterns formed when earth essence flows through different mineral compositions, allowing her shields to be both lighter and stronger than traditional stone barriers.
cards.loreDescription: A disciplined Earth Tempest who has mastered the art of manipulating stone with graceful precision. Oryssa channels ancient earth magic through controlled movements, allowing her to raise protective barriers and launch devastating counterattacks in a single fluid motion. Her emerald robes bear golden trim representing the sacred geometry of earth magic, while her focused expression reveals the intense concentration required to maintain control over the massive stone formations she commands.

cards.name: Leo | The Earth Sovereign

ability.name: Earthly Cycle
ability.description: When this creature is destroyed, special summon one Earth creature from your discard pile (except this card).

specialAbility.name: Quake Impact
specialAbility.description: Exhaust or Refresh 1 creature.

cards.cardFact: Leo can sense disturbances in earth essence across vast distances, making him Grivoss's most vigilant guardian against threats that would upset the balance of elemental power.
cards.loreDescription: The majestic Leo commands respect as the Earth Sovereign, taking the form of a massive lion with a mane of living crystal and jade. His golden-green eyes reflect centuries of accumulated wisdom, while his powerful form combines the ferocity of a predator with the immovable strength of mountains. Ancient earth runes shimmer across his stone-like hide when he channels his formidable earth magic, allowing him to reshape terrain and communicate with the very bedrock of Kinbrold.
